text: krida alewiya namathi wyaparayata krida sambandha danwim, kridakayan nirdesha kirima, pahasukam godananwima, krida upakarana saha balapathra lath welanda bhanda, krida tharanga isaw kalamanakaranaya saha alewi sewa, anugrahakathwaya saha prawesha pathra wikinima, madhya pracharana ayithin, saha kridawata sambandha web adawi athulath madhyayan, pothpath sangara saha widiyo krida aadiya athulathwe.

wattu awata parisarayada alankara lesa sakasa thibe.lama wattuwe prathikara labana daruwanta sithse duwa pana sathutu wimata hakiwana ayurin sakasa athi lama udyanaya da kageth awadhanayata lak wi thibe.rohale bahara karana kalikasala niraparade winashawimata ho thana thana goda gasimata ida nothaba widhimathwa ekkara kompos pohora bawata path kirimata yoda thibena upayada kageth prasadayata lakwa atha.ema kompos pohora upayogi karagena rohal gewaththa elawalu ha mal wagawen alankara kara thibe.rajayata peraththa karamin mudal laba ganima wenuwata rohal sanwardhana kamituwa haraha danapathin, wiwidha wyapara aayathana, aagamika sanwidhana sahaya karagena wasara hatharak wani keti kalayak thuladi mema rohalata ekathu kara di thibena sampathwala watinakama rupiyal laksha hathalihakata wadiya.rohale thawaduratath sewawan pulul kirimata thibena godanagili hingaya maga harawadimata palath saukhya amathyanshaya piyawara ganne nam katugasthota disthrik rohala mangin mahanuwara ha peradeniya pradhana rohalwalata samana sewawan labadimata hakiyawa thibe..

hitapu sabhapathiniyaka wu shanthi kumuduni yana aya nawatha kalaniya pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathiniya lesa path kirimata thiranaya kirima hethuwen pohottuwe manthrin...
